00011 // matte.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "material.h"
00014 // Matte Class Declarations
00015 class Matte : public Material {
00016 public:
00017         // Matte Public Methods
00018         Matte(Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > kd,
00019                         Reference<Texture<float> > sig,
00020                         Reference<Texture<float> > bump) {
00021                 Kd = kd;
00022                 sigma = sig;
00023                 bumpMap = bump;
00024         }
00025         BSDF *GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom,
00026                       const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const;
00027 private:
00028         // Matte Private Data
00029         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kd;
00030         Reference<Texture<float> > sigma, bumpMap;
00031 };
00032 // Matte Method Definitions
00033 BSDF *Matte::GetBSDF(const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom,
00034                 const DifferentialGeometry &dgShading) const {
00035         // Allocate _BSDF_, possibly doing bump-mapping with _bumpMap_
00036         DifferentialGeometry dgs;
00037         if (bumpMap)
00038                 Bump(bumpMap, dgGeom, dgShading, &dgs);
00039         else
00040                 dgs = dgShading;
00041         BSDF *bsdf = BSDF_ALLOC(BSDF)(dgs, dgGeom.nn);
00042         // Evaluate textures for _Matte_ material and allocate BRDF
00043         Spectrum r = Kd->Evaluate(dgs).Clamp();
00044         float sig = Clamp(sigma->Evaluate(dgs), 0.f, 90.f);
00045         if (sig == 0.)
00046                 bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(Lambertian)(r));
00047         else
00048                 bsdf->Add(BSDF_ALLOC(OrenNayar)(r, sig));
00049         return bsdf;
00050         return bsdf;
00051 }
00052 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Material * CreateMaterial(const Transform &xform,
00053                 const TextureParams &mp) {
00054         Reference<Texture<Spectrum> > Kd = mp.GetSpectrumTexture("Kd", Spectrum(1.f));
00055         Reference<Texture<float> > sigma = mp.GetFloatTexture("sigma", 0.f);
00056         Reference<Texture<float> > bumpMap = mp.GetFloatTexture("bumpmap", 0.f);
00057         return new Matte(Kd, sigma, bumpMap);
00058 }
